RelatedSentence: Tonga 's Deputy Prime Minister Samiu Vaipulu has announced that Polynesian Airlines will begin servicing direct flights to Vava'u from Apia , Samoa in August , following a one month delay in introducing the new service .

Tonga 's Deputy Prime Minister Samiu Vaipulu has announced that Polynesian Airlines will begin servicing direct flights to Vava'u from Apia , Samoa in August , following a one month delay in introducing the new service .
